movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of astronauts embarks on a mission through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

movies.title: Harry Potter
movies.description: A young wizard, Harry Potter, discovers his magical heritage and battles the dark wizard Voldemort.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns the truth about reality and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrates their household.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers assemble one last time to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A theme park featuring cloned dinosaurs turns into a disaster when the creatures escape and wreak havoc.

reviews.review: An amazing portrayal of justice and chaos.
